hero.title: Software Developer with a Data Science & Analytics background
hero.subtitle: 2 years working as a developer. 9 years working with data analytics, data science and Machine Learning modeling. Meet the developer who understands your business needs.

companies.title: Experience with companies that are giants in their industries

testimonials.message: I worked with Rodrigo at Dassault Systemes, with him being my peer and mentor throughout the entire business and activity onboarding. Working with him for 4 months, I noticed he has a high analytical capacity and outstanding business and market knowledge. He has excellent technical skills and is an excellent communicator, having done great presentations both in English and Portuguese. I would recommend him both as a professional and as a person.

5 reasons why to hire Rodrigo: 1) Super smart and picks up on what you need straight away. 2) Very talented with a wide-ranging tachnical skill set. 3) Friendly, with a can-do attitude and outstanding service. 4) Provides daily updates even including GIFs/screenshots to show progress. 5) Proactive with exceptional attention to detail.
